clean_data: Systems Administrator span lSystemsspan span lAdministratorspan Systems Administrator North Babylon NY Authorized to work in the US for any employer Work Experience Systems Administrator Advanced Acoustic Concepts Hauppauge NY May 2017 to June 2019 Administered hardened and maintained Windows and Redhat Linux systems in an airgapped secure lab environment as the Information Systems Security Officer achieving the site a Superior rating in security and the Cogswell Award in 2019 Audited systems using Event Viewer and scripts to verify system integrity Set up and monitored user accounts and maintained group permissions through Active Directory Hardened systems using SCAP Compliance Checker and STIG Viewer to ensure physical and virtual environments met security standards and best practices Maintained relevant security settings in the Windows Registry and Group Policy Provided tier 2 and tier 3 technical support for users and customers Created and improved scripts to automate tasks using perl python bash and Powershell Managed virtualized environments Experience with all aspects of Hyper V including creating and backing up virtual machines and configuring virtual networks Experience with setting up modifying and monitoring virtual machines using VirtualBox and KVM Worked on the DevOps team to test and deploy Operating System images with patches and required software to expedite deployment and maintain security for corporate and project assets Created hardened Windows 10 and Windows Server 2016 images using Microsoft Deployment Toolkit including driver injection preinstalling software and improving system security Created updated Windows 7 images using NTLite Tested environment modifications for any errors using VirtualBox and Hyper V then on destination hardware Trained users on new security policies and procedures Set up server hardware Installed new and additional parts including CPUs memory and optical media drives Advised managers on best practices on IT and IT security Communicated ideas and finding details to many different teams Wrote documentation and procedures for IT and IT security projects as needed Network Engineer Intern mindSHIFT New York NY June 2016 to August 2016 Worked with a team of network engineers to set up manage and maintain networks for several charter schools Set up user accounts on Windows and Mac systems Performed troubleshooting on modern networks including TCPIP DNS DHCP VLANs switches routers and wireless devices Configured and performed troubleshooting on printers VoiceoverIP VoIP phones Chrome OS devices Windows 7 workstations and macOS X devices Documented and reported relevant information and errors to clients and management Education Bachelor of Science degree in Information
